text: Diplomatic missions in the Republic of Congo This is a list of diplomatic missions in the Republic of the Congo. At present, the capital city of Brazzaville hosts 31 embassies. Several other countries accredit ambassadors from other capitals. == Embassies == === Brazzaville === {| | * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * |valign=top| * * * * * * * * * * * * * * |} ==Other Posts== * (Delegation) ==Consulates/Consulates-General== === Ouesso === * (Consulate) ===Pointe-Noire=== * (Consulate) * * ==Non-resident embassies== Resident in Kinshasa unless otherwise noted {| | * (Abuja) * (Abuja) * (Addis Ababa) * (Luanda) * * (Paris) * (Abuja) * (Cotonou) * * (Yaoundé) * * (Yaoundé) * * * (Libreville) * (Valletta)https://foreignandeu.gov.mt/en/Pages/Maltese%20Diplomatic%20Representations%20Overseas/Congo.aspx * (Abuja) * * (Luanda) |valign=top| * * (Luanda) * (Dar es Salaam) * (Luanda)http://bazateleadresowa.poland.gov.pl/index.php?k=545&ty;=17.2.16.18.8.4.6.20&documentName;=wPlacowki * * (Luanda) * (Libreville) * (Luanda) * (Nairobi) * * * * * * * * * (Luanda) * * |} == See Also == * Foreign relations of the Republic of the Congo == External links == * Official Site of the Republic of the Congo (in French) Congo-Brazzaville Diplomatic missions
